title: Constant screen freeze
body:
I bought a new computer, and lol has constant screen freezes in matches for a few seconds.

This varies from every 2 minutes, to once a match where the screen only shows a single frame.
When this happends i move my charactor back and the screen gets teleported towards my nexus, and the screen updates like nothing happends.

Does not matter if its group fights or laning phase.

My computer stats:
6600k
1070gtx
32GB memory ( of which 28+ is free)
960 evo ssd ( m2 )

I have tested it without any other processes running on the background and it still happends.

Does anyone have any clue how to fix this?
It annoys me allot.

Thanks in advance,
Erik

replies.body: Since you have a new rig, you might still have outdated drivers or even version of windows that could be setting you back a bit.  Go through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to get things tuned up and smooth out your gameplay.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I had v-sync on for 60 fps, to sync up with me display.
When i disable it, fps went up to 400fps.

Its not really an fps problem, more a freez issue., Programs on the background are uneffected(like teamspeak)

The windows instalation is custom and all drivers are up to date.
